name: The Trickster (Paolotto Games)
description:
Info:

This game was made for a Dev Battle between me and my friend Lennyi, and Dan as the judge.

The theme was Phone Call and we had 4 unconsecutive hours to make it.

Description:

The goal of the game is to make as many prank calls as possible! 

Watch out for the timer and make sure to press the right buttons.

(Left-Click)

Results:

Stranded (Lennyi's Game):

Gameplay: 4/5

Graphics: 4/5

Audio: 0/5

Theme: 2/5

The Trickster (Paolotto's Game):

Gameplay: 2/5

Graphics: 2/5

Audio: 3/5

Theme: 4/5
